home.heading:
Leicester Maher
 Community Association
home.content:
Maher Community Association (UK) was founded to unite the Maher Community and promote and preserve our culture, heritage, language, and social awareness.

Our community is built on a strong foundation due to the hard work and dedication of our past and present committee members, board of trustees, and volunteers, as well as the ongoing support from our local community.

The community organises numerous events, such as Beej, Ram Navami, Holi, Janmashtami, Navratri, Diwali, Christmas, and New Year.

Through these commitments, our goal remains the same: to invest in the next generation—our youth, who will proudly continue to carry our heritage.

As we enter the new era, we want to encourage our community to embrace new services and new technology and build a platform for our youth to participate with excitement and enthusiasm. We encourage each Maher family to engage by becoming a member, participating in our activities, and helping us grow to build a stronger community.

surnames.heading: Surnames
surnames.text:
Surnames are very important in the Maher community, and each surname has a long and distinctive history.

Our Maher community has 14 main surnames: Keshwala, Sisodia, Rajsakha, Odedra, Jadeja, Solanki, Parmar, Vadher, Vada, Chavda, Chohan, Vadar, Pathiar, and Vagh.

Several sub-surnames exist within these main surnames. Here is the list of full surnames and sub-surnames known as the 'Bhaiyatas' brotherhood.

surnames.bhaiyat: Antrolia, Bheynia, Ratadia, Butta, Erda, Bagordara
Modhwadia, Kuchhadia, Khistriya, Godhania, Ranavaya, Hadadiya, Pashtariya
surnames.kuldevi: Shri Vindhyavasini Aai / Shri Chamundai / Shri Gatran Aai / Shri Sikotar Aai

surnames.bhaiyat: Karavadra, Khunti, Tilak, Gorania, Chundavadra, Jethwa, Surya, Jog, Modedra, Selot, Selar, Pariya, Bhosiya, Bokhiria
Kadchha, Ratiya, Tarkhala, Kadegiya, Pipraniya, Mekhadiya, Kulranmiya
Solanki, Timba, Samja, Vadaliya, Jakhniya, Bhanvadiya, Chabhhad, Divraniya, Bhogesra, Juneja, Gariyana, Sida, Chhaya
Mahiyaria, Chatraviya, Liboriya, Kahaliya, Kotadiya, Jilaniya, Mosa, Mandera, Pata, Gorsera, Badeja, Chandela
surnames.kuldevi: Simiyar - Mandvari / Shri Maha Kali / Shri Mandavadi Aai

surnames.bhaiyat: Sharma, Sutreja, Sindhal, Padodariya, Chandesha, Dasa, Pandavadariya, Chanrodariya, Mahikya
surnames.kuldevi: Shri Khodiyar Aai / Shri Gatran Aai

surnames.bhaiyat: Muliyashiya, Khimdaniya, Bapodra-(Mashani) Amar, Agath, Mihikiya, Timmasiya, Bhetakiya
surnames.kuldevi: Visant Mataji / Shri Vindhyavasini Aai / Chamunda Mataji / Vihot Mataji

surnames.bhaiyat: Nandaniya, Nakura, Badhsa, Hilla, Jasiya, Bamaniya

surnames.kuldevi: Shri Amba Mataji / Shri Khodiyar Mataji
